name: Asteroid Racer
description:
This is a cool game I have made in Scratch that has then been  exported as a .swf (playable here) as well as a .app which you can download. I have also included the .sb2 code for 50c that you can download and edit in scratch. Enjoy!!

The controls are fairly simple, use the arrow keys to move left and right, use the space bar to shoot and get the most points possible!

The old game has an enemy ship that I think makes the game too hard so I have put on an updated of the version of the game without the ship. 

If you have any suggestions let me know in the comments.
